SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fit.household.repository

Interface AbstractRepository<K,T>

Type Parameters:
K - key of the repository
T - value which has to be linked with key
All Known Subinterfaces:
AbstractHouseHoldRepository, AbstractMembershipRepository, AbstractUserRepository, HouseHoldRepository, UserRepository
public interface AbstractRepository<K,T>
Generalization of the repository main function. Created to solve problem related to dependency on Hibernate.
